content.body: sideshowbarker: Will add you to the issue I made earlier, thank you!

content.body: Hey folks! I'm playing around with module scripts and I see that a module script struct is being passed to EcmaScript and back through ParseModule.[[HostDefined]] item. I'm wondering if that is done by value or by reference. More explicitly, if I later change the module script struct, would that change be reflected when grabbing that ParseModule.[[HostDefined]]?
